# Trackingplan
Trackingplan is a marketing data monitoring and auditing tool: digital analytics, product analytics, marketing pixels, campaign tagging, consent and privacy.
As a marketing observability tool, Trackingplan auto-discovers the configuration of websites and apps, automatically detects errors and simplifies debugging thanks to its data exploration tools.

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://www.trackingplan.com): The homepage of Trackingplan, providing an overview of the product and its features.
- [Product](https://www.trackingplan.com/product): Details about Trackingplan's product offerings and capabilities.
- [How It Works](https://www.trackingplan.com/how-it-works): Explanation of how Trackingplan operates and benefits users.
- [Pricing](https://www.trackingplan.com/pricing): Information on pricing plans for Trackingplan services.
- [Search](https://www.trackingplan.com/search): Search page to find specific content or features on Trackingplan.

## Resources

- [Guides](https://www.trackingplan.com/guides): Comprehensive guides and tutorials for using Trackingplan.
- [Changelog](https://www.trackingplan.com/changelog): Updates and changes made to Trackingplan over time.

## Use Cases

- [Data Analyst Use Case](https://www.trackingplan.com/use-cases/data-analyst): How data analysts can leverage Trackingplan for data management and analysis.
- [Developers Use Case](https://www.trackingplan.com/use-cases/developers): How developers can integrate and utilize Trackingplan in their projects.
- [Marketing Use Case](https://www.trackingplan.com/use-cases/marketing): How marketing teams can benefit from Trackingplan's features.
- [Trackingplan for Agencies](https://www.trackingplan.com/use-cases/trackingplan-for-agencies): Solutions tailored for agencies using Trackingplan.

## Tools

- [Regex Tester](https://www.trackingplan.com/regex-tester): Tool for testing regular expressions for tracking configurations.
- [UTM Builder Tool](https://www.trackingplan.com/utm-builder-tool): Tool to create UTM parameters for campaign tracking.
- [Free Analytics Audit](https://www.trackingplan.com/free-analytics-audit): Free audit service to evaluate your analytics setup.
- [Migrate to GA4 with Trackingplan](https://www.trackingplan.com/migrate-to-ga4-with-trackingplan): Service to help migrate your analytics to Google Analytics 4.
- [Compare](https://www.trackingplan.com/compare): Comparison of Trackingplan with other analytics tools.

## Integrations

- [6sense](https://www.trackingplan.com/integrations/6sense): Integration with 6sense for enhanced marketing insights.
- [AB Tasty](https://www.trackingplan.com/integrations/ab-tasty): Integration with AB Tasty for A/B testing and optimization.
- [ActiveCampaign](https://www.trackingplan.com/integrations/activecampaign): Integration with ActiveCampaign for email marketing automation.

- [How to Assess and Improve Your Data Quality](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/how-to-assess-and-improve-your-data-quality): Steps to evaluate and enhance your data quality.
- [How to Assess Your Data Maturity Level](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/how-to-assess-your-data-maturity-level): Determining your organization's data maturity.
- [How to Create a Customer Data Tracking Plan](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/how-to-create-a-customer-data-tracking-plan): Steps to develop an effective customer data tracking plan.

- [SEO Plagiarism](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/seo-plagiarism): Understanding and avoiding SEO plagiarism.
- [Shifting Left Your Analytics Testing](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/shifting-left-your-analytics-testing): Integrating analytics testing early in the development process.
- [The Death of Third-Party Cookies: Why You Should Care About First-Party Data](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/the-death-of-third-party-cookies-why-you-should-care-about-first-party-data): The shift towards first-party data in the era of declining third-party cookies.
- [The True Costs of Data Debt](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/the-true-costs-of-data-debt): Exploring the implications of data debt on business operations.
- [Time is Money: Trackingplan's Role in Digital Analytics Efficiency](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/time-is-money-trackingplans-role-in-digital-analytics-efficiency): How Trackingplan enhances efficiency in digital analytics.
- [Tracking Horror Stories: Tales from the Digital Analytics Trenches](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/tracking-horror-stories-tales-from-the-digital-analytics-trenches): Real-world challenges and lessons in digital analytics.
- [User Acquisition Attribution Report: Uncover the Origins of Your Success](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/user-acquisition-attribution-report-uncover-the-origins-of-your-success): Understanding user acquisition through attribution reporting.
- [What are the Business Risks of Poor Data Quality](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/what-are-the-business-risks-of-poor-data-quality): The dangers businesses face due to low data quality.
- [What is a Tracking Plan and Why It Matters](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/what-is-a-tracking-plan-why-it-matters): The significance of a well-structured tracking plan.
- [What is Data Governance and Why Do You Need It](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/what-is-data-governance-and-why-do-you-need-it): The role of data governance in organizational data management.
- [What is Data Integrity](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/what-is-data-integrity): Understanding data integrity and its importance.
- [Why is Quality Assurance Important in Your Digital Analytics](https://www.trackingplan.com/blog/why-is-quality-assurance-important-in-your-digital-analytics): The necessity of QA in maintaining analytics accuracy.

## FAQs

- [FAQs](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs): Frequently Asked Questions about Trackingplan.

### All FAQs

- [Are there any limitations on the free plan?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/are-there-any-limitations-on-the-free-plan): Information about the limitations of Trackingplan's free plan.
- [Can agencies mention or add Trackingplan to their portfolio?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/can-agencies-mention-or-add-trackingplan-to-their-portfolio): Guidelines for agencies regarding Trackingplan usage in portfolios.
- [Can I share my tracking plan with my other team members?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/can-i-share-my-tracking-plan-with-my-other-team-members): How to share tracking plans within your team.
- [Can I specify in advance the values I expect for a property?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/can-i-specify-in-advance-the-values-i-expect-for-a-property): Setting expected property values in Trackingplan.
- [Can I use Trackingplan to monitor websites and apps?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/can-i-use-trackingplan-to-monitor-websites-and-apps): Utilizing Trackingplan for website and app monitoring.
- [Can I use Trackingplan to QA my events and campaigns?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/can-i-use-trackingplan-to-qa-my-events-and-campaigns-2): Using Trackingplan for quality assurance of events and campaigns.
- [Can I use Trackingplan to securely migrate to GA4?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/can-i-use-trackingplan-to-securely-migrate-to-ga4): Ensuring secure migration to Google Analytics 4 with Trackingplan.
- [Can Trackingplan prevent errors in my campaign naming conventions to ensure error-free UTMs?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/can-trackingplan-prevent-errors-in-my-campaign-naming-conventions-to-ensure-error-free-utms): How Trackingplan helps maintain accurate UTM naming conventions.
- [Can Trackingplan work with my current analytics stack or my in-house analytics system?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/can-trackingplan-work-with-my-current-analytics-stack-or-my-in-house-analytics-system): Compatibility of Trackingplan with existing analytics setups.
- [Can UTM parameters be edited after a URL is created and shared?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/can-utm-parameters-be-edited-after-a-url-is-created-and-shared): Editing UTM parameters post URL creation.
- [Can we trial Trackingplan before committing?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/can-we-trial-trackingplan-before-committing): Options for trialing Trackingplan before purchase.
- [Data Integrity vs Data Quality: Are they the same?](https://www.trackingplan.com/faqs/data-integrity-vs-data-quality-are-they-the-same): Understanding the difference between data integrity and data quality.
